clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Auricular Acupuncture on Sleeping Model After General Anesthesia

lead_sponsor.agency: Air Force Military Medical University, China

clinical_study.source: Air Force Military Medical University, China

brief_summary.textblock: Sleeping model can be affected after surgery. Anesthetics may be involved in the change. However, whether different anesthetics exert different effect on postoperative sleep is still unclear. In this study, we tend to observe the sleeping model after general anesthesia with different techniques.

primary_outcome.measure: total sleeping time during the first 24 hours after surgery
primary_outcome.time_frame: from discharge from post-anesthesia care unit to 24 hours later, totally 24 hours

secondary_outcome.measure: sleeping time during the first night from 11 PM to 6 AM after surgery
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from 11 PM to 6 AM , totally 7 hours

secondary_outcome.measure: sleeping time during the second night from 11 PM to 6 AM after surgery
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from 11 PM to 6 AM , totally 7 hours

secondary_outcome.measure: sleeping time during the third night from 11 PM to 6 AM after surgery
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from 11 PM to 6 AM , totally 7 hours

arm_group.description: auricular acupuncture is one of the many forms of acupuncture, and is a distinctive part of Chinese medicine that has been practiced in China for thousands of years. It is employed by placing fine needles in specifically designated "puncture points" on the external ear.

intervention.description: Fine seeds will be attached on the surface of external ear and will be massaged intermittently.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- aged 18 years to 60 years old
- elective laparoscopic surgery under general anesthesia
- anticipated duration of surgery between 1 hours to 3 hours
Exclusion Criteria:
- history of sleeping disorder
- history of neurological or psychological disorder
- suspected abuse of drugs or alcohol
- use of sedatives during the last 6 months
